argument.name: errors
argument.description: The row error to be set.

page.description: Sets the 'row error' for the specified row.
page.discussion: Sets the 'row error' for the specified row. A 'row error' appears as an icon to the left of the row. Row errors are used when the error does not apply to a specific field. The method takes an array of JSON objects. The JSON objects have a 'row' and 'message' property.
